pathAssistantSteps.info: 1. Set up a meeting with your manager, to review the customers portal for approval to Go Live.

1. Enter all of the data from the Onboarding Questionnaire
  2. Create new opportunity and load contract details
  3. Add emails to sub account
  4. Verify account structure and access
  5. Verify you can login to the customers vendor portal
  6. Let the Engineer know the portal data is ready to be loaded to Salesforce
  7. Ensure contact is set up
  8. Activate community user
1. Email the customer and include a Calendly link for an Onboarding call and include the Onboarding Questionnaire, to gather additional information prior to the call.

1. Host a virtual demo where you screen share with customer, to help them login to their portal.
  2. Ensure they approve email to begin forwarding invoices.
  3. Gather customer feedback from the call, and enter it into notes.
